home.name: Babak Soleimani
home.title: Web Developer
home.description: I’m Babak, an aspiring Web Developer with a strong motivation to start an Ausbildung in the IT field in Germany. I’m currently building a solid foundation in modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. My goal is to grow into a professional who can develop reliable, user-friendly, and efficient digital solutions.
